channel.title: [317] to much drops from npc wont let me login to server

item.title: [317] to much drops from npc wont let me login to server
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

If all else fails… HARD CODE IT

PS. Updated this post like 10 time lol…

If you can’t find the answer here is an easy way around it…

Please be a delta source…
Oh well if its not
Original Code - NPCHandler.java

	public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID, NPC npc) {
		try {
			int totalDrops = dropCount[NPCID] / 3;
			if (totalDrops > 0) {
				// Random roller = new Random();
				for (int i = 0; i < dropCount[NPCID]; i += 3) {
					double roll = Math.random() * 100;
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[npc
							.getKiller()];
					if (p != null) {
						if (p.debug) {
							p.sM("Roll:  " + roll + ", Itemid:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i] + ", amt:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i + 1] + ", percent:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i + 2]);
						}
					}
					if (roll <= drops[NPCID][i + 2]) {
						if (p != null) {
							if (p.debug)
								p.sM("Rewarding " + drops[NPCID][i]);
						}
						if ((drops[NPCID] != null) && (npc != null))
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) drops[NPCID][i],
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) drops[NPCID][i + 1], npc.getKiller());
					}
				}
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}

Explained code
You will be adding this

//add this #### is the NpcId
//@@@@ is the ItemId
//$$$$ = item amount-------------------------------------------------------
                                                int dropchance = ((Math.random() * 99)+1);//1-100
                                                int dropchance1 = ((Math.random() * 99)+1);//1-100
                                                int dropchanceA = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int dropchanceB = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int NpcIdA = 0;//NpcWanted
                                                int ItemIdA = 0;//ItemId wanted
                                                int ItemAmtA = 0;//Item Amt
                                                int ItemIdB = 0;//ItemId wanted
                                                int ItemAmtB = 0;//Item Amt
						if ((drops[NPCID] == NpcIdA)) {
							if ((dropchance <= dropchanceA)) {//5 percent
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) ItemIdA,
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) ItemAmtA, npc.getKiller());
							}
							if ((dropchance1 <= dropchanceB)) {//5 percent
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) ItemIdB,
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) ItemAmtB, npc.getKiller());
							}

						}
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Showing where to put the code

	public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID, NPC npc) {
		try {
			int totalDrops = dropCount[NPCID] / 3;
			if (totalDrops > 0) {
				// Random roller = new Random();
				for (int i = 0; i < dropCount[NPCID]; i += 3) {
					double roll = Math.random() * 100;
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[npc
							.getKiller()];
					if (p != null) {
						if (p.debug) {
							p.sM("Roll:  " + roll + ", Itemid:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i] + ", amt:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i + 1] + ", percent:  "
									+ drops[NPCID][i + 2]);
						}
					}
//add this #### is the NpcId
//@@@@ is the ItemId
//$$$$ = item amount-------------------------------------------------------
                                                int dropchance = ((Math.random() * 99)+1);//1-100
                                                int dropchance1 = ((Math.random() * 99)+1);//1-100
                                                int dropchanceA = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int dropchanceB = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int NpcIdA = 0;//NpcWanted
                                                int ItemIdA = 0;//ItemId wanted
                                                int ItemAmtA = 0;//Item Amt
                                                int ItemIdB = 0;//ItemId wanted
                                                int ItemAmtB = 0;//Item Amt
						if ((drops[NPCID] == NpcIdA)) {
							if ((dropchance <= dropchanceA)) {//5 percent
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) ItemIdA,
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) ItemAmtA, npc.getKiller());
							}
							if ((dropchance1 <= dropchanceB)) {//5 percent
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) ItemIdB,
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) ItemAmtB, npc.getKiller());
							}

						}
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
					if (roll <= drops[NPCID][i + 2]) {
						if (p != null) {
							if (p.debug)
								p.sM("Rewarding " + drops[NPCID][i]);
						}
						if ((drops[NPCID] != null) && (npc != null))
							server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(p, (int) drops[NPCID][i],
									npc.absX, npc.absY,
									(int) drops[NPCID][i+1], npc.getKiller());
					}
				}
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}

yay for doing all the work for you - Handles 2 Items now

                                                int dropchance1 = ((Math.random() * 99)+1);//1-100
                                                int dropchanceA = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int dropchanceB = 5;//Drop chance
                                                int NpcIdA = 0;//NpcWanted
                                                int ItemIdA = 0;//ItemId wanted

item.title: [317] to much drops from npc wont let me login to server
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:11, topic:376576”][quote author=KoF link=topic=472502.msg3456341#msg3456341 date=1294066389]

There has to be an error some where. It’s a pain in the ass to find… um… try re-downloading the original source you used, or basically any other, rip the npcdrops.cfg file and then re-add your own drops. Its annoying but it would be the fastest way in the long run…

also just to make sure, did you compile after you edited the npchandler.java ?

i have the source on my pc and there is done with spaces
and yes i compiled after editing npchandler.java

just te problem is te limit of 15… i know its there, cuz if i delete all in npcdrop.cfg -> i can login

but i want more than 15 drops per npc , so have the drop rate from rs…

need to now how i change the limit i guess its in npchanlder.java the script i posted but i made it 135 but didnt work :s im stuck with it
[/quote]

Uhhhh. you know there are two ways too add drops to an npc :|, and you can add as many drops as you want.[/quote]
ok and you can tell me how? cuz i tryd to change the limit in npchandler class but didnt work… :s

[quote=“rash, post:10, topic:376576”]Im sure you can change the limit of drops.

Let me find out.[/quote]

yes @ npchandler.java

search for drop and you wil see // drop room per npc

i tryd to change but still cant login with that amount of drops…

Read full topic

@Clawz_fury wrote:

There has to be an error some where. It’s a pain in the ass to find… um… try re-downloading the original source you used, or basically any other, rip the npcdrops.cfg file and then re-add your own drops. Its annoying but it would be the fastest way in the long run…

also just to make sure, did you compile after you edited the npchandler.java ?
[/quote]

i have the source on my pc and there is done with spaces
and yes i compiled after editing npchandler.java

just te problem is te limit of 15… i know its there, cuz if i delete all in npcdrop.cfg -> i can login

but i want more than 15 drops per npc , so have the drop rate from rs…

need to now how i change the limit i guess its in npchanlder.java the script i posted but i made it 135 but didnt work :s im stuck with it :([/quote]

Uhhhh. you know there are two ways too add drops to an npc :|, and you can add as many drops as you want.

@KoF wrote:

i have much drops for 1 npc, but thats what i want…
now i cant login to my server coz of the drops , i delete all drops and can back login.

How can I increase the number of drop?

i tryd in npchandler.java but failed:

[code]public int[] combatLevel = new int[3851];
public int[] dropCount = new int[3851];

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][135]; // room for 15 drops per npc[/code]

i changed 45 to 135 coz i saw on other source. other source has 45 room per npc.
